mapper.select: select sc.id,sc.shop_id,sc.user_id,sc.create_time,sc.type,sc.is_anonym,sc.content,sc.pic_urls, sc.admin_content,u.head_pic,u.user_name,u.sex,TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,u.birthday,NOW()) as age from shop_comment sc left join `user` u on u.id = sc.user_id where sc.shop_id = #{shopId}

select count(id) as commentTotal, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 1 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as environmentFineCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 2 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as environmentMiddlingCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 3 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as environmentLowerCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 4 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as serviceFineCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 5 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as serviceMiddlingCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 6 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as serviceLowerCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 7 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as playFineCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 8 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as playMiddlingCount, (select count(id) from shop_comment where type = 9 and shop_id = #{shopId}) as playLowerCount from shop_comment where shop_id = #{shopId} group by shop_id
